pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantā addasaṁsu chagalakaṁ ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.4: “handa mayaṁ, āvuso, imaṁ chagalakaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāma karoma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.5: Imaṁ ajikaṁ mettiyaṁ nāma bhikkhuniṁ karoma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.7: Pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ sutena avocumhā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.8: Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṁ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.9: Te taṁ chagalakaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāma akaṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.10: Taṁ ajikaṁ mettiyaṁ nāma bhikkhuniṁ akaṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.12: “pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ sutena avocumhā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.13: Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṁ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.17: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.18: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.19: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathayime bhikkhū āhaṁsū”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.22: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.23: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathayime bhikkhū āhaṁsū”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.28: “Yato ahaṁ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunadhammaṁ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.29: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—“tena hi, bhikkhave, ime bhikkhū anuyuñjathā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.30: Idaṁ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anuyuñjiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.2: Te bhikkhūhi anuyuñjīyamānā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.3: “kiṁ pana tumhe, āvuso, āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.5: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.6: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.7: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.8: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.11: “kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.14.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ duṭṭho doso appatīto aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁseyya— ‘appeva nāma naṁ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyan’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.15: Tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā aññabhāgiyañceva taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ hoti koci deso lesamatto upādinno, bhikkhu ca dosaṁ patiṭṭhāti, saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.1.10: tena ca kopena, tena ca dosena, tāya ca anattamanatāya, tāya ca anabhiraddhiyā appatīto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.12: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ āpattādhikaraṇassa siyā tabbhāgiyaṁ siyā aññabhāgiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.2: leso nāma dasa lesā— jātileso, nāmaleso, gottaleso, liṅgaleso, āpattileso, pattaleso, cīvaraleso, upajjhāyaleso, ācariyaleso, senāsanaleso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.4: khattiyo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.9: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.22: saṅgharakkhito diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.31: vāsiṭṭho diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.40: odāto diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.53: sumbhakapattadharo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.60: gahapaticīvaradharo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.66: itthannāmassa saddhivihāriko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.72: itthannāmassa antevāsiko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.78: itthannāmasenāsanavāsiko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.83: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.5: Appeva nāma naṁ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.6: bhikkhubhāvā cāveyyaṁ, samaṇadhammā cāveyyaṁ, sīlakkhandhā cāveyyaṁ, tapoguṇā cāveyyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.8: yasmiṁ khaṇe anuddhaṁsito hoti, taṁ khaṇaṁ taṁ layaṁ taṁ muhuttaṁ vītivatte.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.10: yena vatthunā anuddhaṁsito hoti tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ samanuggāhīyamāno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.14: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.16: tesaṁ lesānaṁ aññataro leso upādinno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.18: tucchakaṁ mayā bhaṇitaṁ, musā mayā bhaṇitaṁ, abhūtaṁ mayā bhaṇitaṁ, ajānantena mayā bhaṇitaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.1: Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṅghādisese saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.4: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.5: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.6: Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṅghādisese thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.13: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.14: Bhikkhu thullaccayaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti thullaccaye thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.22: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.26: dubbhāsitaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, dubbhāsite dubbhāsitadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.34: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.35: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.1: Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti saṅghādisese saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.4: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.5: Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṅghādisese thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.12: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.13: Bhikkhu thullaccayaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti thullaccaye thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.21: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.25: dubbhāsitaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti dubbhāsite dubbhāsitadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.33: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.34: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
